component.summary: Client « Telepathy » pour messages « SMS / MMS »
Client di telepathy per SMS e MMS

description.p: Spacebar is a telepathy client for Plasma Mobile, that is primarily written for sending and receiving SMS/MMS.
Spacebar Plasma Mobil üçün telepaty müştərisidir və ilkin olaraq SMS/MMS göndərmək və almaq üçün yazılmışdır.
L'Spacebar és un client del Telepathy per al Plasma Mobile, el qual està escrit principalment per a enviar i rebre SMS/MMS.
L'Spacebar és un client de Telepathy per a Plasma Mobile, el qual està escrit principalment per a enviar i rebre SMS/MMS.
Spacebar is a telepathy client for Plasma Mobile, that is primarily written for sending and receiving SMS/MMS.
Spacebar es un cliente de Telepathy para Plasma Mobile, escrito principalmente para enviar y recibir SMS/MMS.
Le logiciel Spacebar est un client « Telepathy » pour Plasma Mobile. Il a été développé initialement pour l'envoi et la réception de messages « SMS / MMS ».
Spacebar è un client di telepathy per Plasma Mobile, che è stato scritto principalmente per inviare e per ricevere SMS e MMS.
Spacebar는 Plasma 모바일용 Telepathy 클라이언트입니다. 주 사용 목적은 SMS/MMS 주고받기입니다.
Spacebar is een client van telepathy voor Plasma Mobile, die primair is geschreven voor het verzenden en ontvangen van SMS/MMS.

Spacebar jest klientem telepathy dla Plasma Mobile, który został głównie napisany do wysyłania i odbierania SMS/MMS.
O Spacebar é um cliente de Telepathy para o Plasma Mobile, que foi criado principalmente para receber e enviar SMS/MMS.

Spacebar je odjemalec programa telepahy za Plasma Mobile, ki je v prvenstveno napisan za pošiljanje in prejemanje SMS/MMS-ov.
Spacebar är en Telepathy-klient för Plasma Mobil, som i huvudsak är skriven för att skicka och ta emot SMS/MMS.
Spacebar, Plasma Mobile için bir telepathy istemcisidir. Ana amacı, SMS/MMS alımı ve gönderimidir.
Spacebar — клієнт telepathy для мобільної версії Плазми. Основним завданням програми є надсилання і отримання SMS/MMS.

ul.li: General bug-fixing and improvements
Fix mimetype for VCards
Change header style to toolbar
Flatten application navigation
Improvements in add attachment layout
Add notification settings options
Add support for choosing phone number via contact
Allow to open the links in messages
Mark incoming message as read for open chat conversations
Fix crash when sending message to non-contact
Minor user interface improvements and bugfixes
Port spacebar to use ModemManager
Support for MMS and group messages
Streamlined handling of the phone numbers
Options to customize the appearance of the chat bubble colors and message font size
Added the ability to delete individual messages
Added the ability to extract links and 2FA codes from within a message's text and copy it to the clipboard
Added the ability to resend a failed message
The current chat's notifications are disabled when viewing it
Chat list shows date/time of most recent message
Message text input now allows multiple lines
Fixed premium number detection
Rework the phone number normalization, which should now find more cases of differently formatted numbers belonging to the same contact
More possible errors while sending messages are now reported to the user
Display dates above messages
Phone Numbers are now always displayed in local format
It is now visible from which number a message will be sent
The chat list is now correctly sorted
Links in messages are now clickable
Spacebar now opens sms protocol links
There is now a warning when trying to text premium SMS numbers
